PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DamperTypeSmokeDamper
PropertySetDef.Definition:
Smoke damper type attributes.
Pset renamed from Pset_DamperTypeSmoke to Pset_DamperTypeSmokeDamper in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

PropertyDef.Name: ControlType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of control used to operate the damper (e.g., Open/Closed Indicator, Resetable Temperature Sensor, Temperature Override, etc.) .
